items.title: [Quesnel Cariboo Observer] FOREST OPERATIONS MAPs #2898 ‚Äì INVITATION TO COMMENT
items.content_html: The public is invited to review and comment on West Fraser’s Forest Operations Maps (FOM) #2898. The FOM shows proposed road construction and cut block development under West Fraser’s Forest Stewardship Plan (FSP) within Forest Development Units in the Quesnel Natural Resource District (DQU) and Tree Farm License 52 (TFL52). These FOMs have a validity period of 3 years beginning March 28, 2026. During the validity period, West Fraser may apply for Cutting Permits containing cut blocks and road permits to construct roads shown on the FOM.

items.content_html: The public is invited to review and comment on this Forest Operations Map (FOM). The FOM shows proposed cut block development and proposed road construction under the listed Forest Stewardship Plan (FSP) within Forest Development Units in the Quesnel Natural Resource District. The FOM has a validity period of 3 years beginning February 18, 2026. During the validity period, the licensee may apply for cutting permits containing cut blocks and apply for road permits to construct roads shown on their FOM.
